About Us

The numbers say it all. Being in the market for more than 45 years, with
1,700 employees, 300 service vehicles, more than 70 strategically
located branches in the region and 11 manufacturing plant, MHE-Demag
is the name of material handling in the region.

We engineer, manufacture and maintain a comprehensive range of
industrial cranes and hoists, warehousing equipment such as lift trucks
and dock levellers, aerial work platforms, building maintenance units
for safe working at heights, compact construction equipment,
as well as automated car parking systems.
